slide.title: The Installer
slide.blurb: why deploy code via a pear installer?

list.bullet: imagine a new release of a package you've bundled comes out fixing a critical security issue.
Do you tell your users/customers to copy files on top of others and risk things being done incorrectly...
you can use the pear installer for deploying your own applications and packages.

slide.blurb: why not rpm or deb or....just include everything in one big archive

list.bullet: pear packages are operating system agnostic
